t2.Precision Shot: ATK rises by 20% and ACC rises by 400%.
t2.Eagle Eye: Increases all allies DEF Penetration by 150 and ACC by 75. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 50 additional DEF Penetration and 25 additional ACC apply.
t2.Mortal Wound: Successful Crit Attack reduces enemy recovery rate by 50% and deal Physical continuous DMG every second equal to 20% ATK. Does not stack.
t2.Opportune Strike: Crit Chance is increased by 150 and Crit DMG is increased by 30%.
t2.Concentration: Every 5 sec, increases own Crit DMG by 4%. This effect can be stacked up to max 25 times and is irremovable.
